S.FORM: Columbia Columbia Columbia kapulungan a kanatal (西班牙語:República de Colombia), pangangan han tu Columbia , u Nan-me-cuw i satipan nu amisanay a kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam: :República de Colombia), ) u Columbia sa ilabu nu Congnanmeico, itiza i 4 00 N, 72 00 W, u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 1,138,910 km2, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 1,038,700 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 100,210 km2 ,hamin nu tademaw sa 47,220,856. kakalukan umah sa 37.50%, kilakilangan umah sa 54.40%, zumaay henay umah sa 8.10% tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Bogota . sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 20 bulad 7 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Iván Duque Márquez , micakat a demiad sa i 2018 a mihca 8 bulad 7 demiad. u hata nu Colombia u kulit nu hata nu Colombia sa ,situlu a kulit, u takuliway u semilaway atu sumanahay. Columbia Ke-lum-bi-ya-kung-he-ku (西班牙語:República de Colombia), pangangan han tu Columbia , u Nan-me-cuw i satipan nu amisanay a kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam: :República de Colombia), .) laylay i kasumamadan henay u Ci-pu-ca a binacadan u Yin-ti-an a tademaw i tini muenengay tina lala'an Spain mihephepay pakalatu 1500 a mihcaanay, katukuh tu kuynian a kakitizaan maka awas tu mangangayawan, u hitay, unikawlah nu ngangayaw atu libung nu imelang, masulup amin ku balucu' nu i tiniay Ci-pu-zen a tademaw, u heni kalamkam satu a patizeng a i tiza nueneng satu i 1717 a mihcaan malahatu mala u pasu u Spain i Nan-me-cuw nu satipan nuwamisan a kakitizaan nu micumuday a lala'an kakitizaan "a Sin-ke-la-na-ta"新格拉納達". Columbia mikawaw tu misateked i 1810 a mihcaan a mabuwah pitu a bulad sabaw tusa a demiad musakamu amiliyas tu Si-pang-ya a misateked , sazikuzay i 1819 a mihcaan maala pakademec tu, 1821 a mihcaan atu ayzaay a E-kua-du , Wey-ne-zuy-la , Pa-na-ma u nikasakaput tu tabakiay a Columbia kapulungan a kanatal , ayza satu Sin-ke-lan-na-ta pasumad tu ngangan nu tabakiay a Columbia kapulungan a kanatal"大哥倫比亞共和國"(Gran Colombia)han Si-meng-pu-li-wa-li-wa-el tahekal mala zung-tung , katukuh i 1830 a mihcaan unian a mihcaan Si-meng-pu-li-wa-li-wa-el micuzuh tu unian a kanatal tu nizatengan nu tademawan min, lalabu nu kanatal u cen-ce a tu lala' malaengeli' sazikuzay satu i a 1830 a mihcaanWiy-ne-zuy-la atu E-kuwa-du miliyas tu tabakiay a Columbia kapulungan a kanatal a misateket, Ta-ke-lun-pi-ya-kung-he-ku namahini satu malaliyas, Pu-li-wa-li-wa-el i kalaluman patay satu, tabakiay a Columbia kapulungan a kanatal u liwan a lala' pasumat han ku ngangan Sin-ke-la-na-ta"新格拉納達"(Nueva Granada), 1856 a mihcaan pasumad tu ngangan Ke-lan-na-da-lian-bang"格蘭納達聯邦"(Confederación Granadina)han, 1863 a mihcaan pasumad aca tu ngangan Columbia-he-cung-ku"哥倫比亞合眾國" han, sazikuzay(Estados Unidos de Colombia), Sazikuzay i 1886 a mihcaan pasumad aca tu ngangan nu Columbia kapulungan a kanatal"哥倫比亞共和國"han, nika lalabu nu kanatal caay kalecat kuni u cen-ce u icelang pikuwan makelap nu zumaan nu sangaan tu malaliyasay mahiza tu malalit satu hina mabuwah tu lalabuay kinangangaaw , hina buwah mangangayaw ku lalabuay nu kanatal, 1903 a mihcaan Pa-na-ma I tini a Me-ku tu pipadang mamakay Columbia a nisakateked . imahini Columbia mahiza tu nu padang henay a hitay mahiniay a hitay patinaku u Columbia ke-min-uw-zuan-li-lian (FARC)), atu pacakayay tu siledekay a sapayu' malawlaw tu satu, u lalabu nu kanatal a cen-ce kikasumad tu masakangelu'an tu atu pihazen tu kuni papelpel ku ni kauzip nu binawlan amin, amalilit ku lalayan nu Columbia a kanatal. namisateked hawsa katukuh i 2002 a mihcaan, umisatekeday a misakaputay atu u mazekeday a sakaput, Ze-yu-dang atu Paw-su-dang kakutay sa a mikawaw, Columbia a cung-dung ci U-li-wey namala cung-dung tu 2002 a mihcaan, miala tu pasaicelang atekatay a pakawananay a zazanan, FARC malawitan nu uynian a kanatal a zen-bu, u kawaw namakay anitu ni ungangayaw i 1983 a mihcaan namipatay tu wama ni U-li-wiy , namacakat i pabaw U-li-wiy hasa, amipelpel tu Columbia mingayaw ku saayaway a kawaw satu. An-di-de-san a buyu'an pabesut I nusatipa, malaliting ku buyu' atu dihep, I lilies nu bayu' mapetpetay a nenal,satipan nu anisanaynu Ma-ke-da-lay-ma-he I sasa malikit masaupu I masanenalay, sawalian u Ya-ma-sun-he atu Au-li-nu-ke-he ipabaw nu kasacilis nu sauwac malikit tayza i masanenalay, macalap mahamin ku kanatal u he bala 2/3 ku hekal nu lala'.u demiad nu mauzipay nulangaway Ke-lun-pi-ya tungusay u mauzipay nulangaway u aadupan nu hekal nu lala' u kakakilac a kakitizaan, u akudiay a kakitizaan. (u kamu nu Hulam: .) Sakakawawan a keni nu kakitizaan行政區劃 Columbia a kanatal mala u 3/2 a niyazu' atu cacay kahenulan a tuse. (u kamu nu Hulam: ) zen-ze Ke-lun-pi-ya a zen-ze u cung-tung ku situngusay tu nu Min-cu-ze-cung-he-ku i panutek i lalabu a mikawaw, i tini i lalabu a sakakawawan Columbia-cung-tung u satalakaway nu kanatal u sibunuay aca a zen-ze mikawaw a tukatuutay a sakaputan, Sin-zen-cuan si tungusy mikawaw u zen-bu ku mikawaway, Columbia cenhu atu Ku-huy tusaay a tatengilan a kanatal, Can-iy-uyan atuKung-iy-uen situngusay tu hulic Li-ba-cuan , Se-ba-ki-go misateked mikawaw tu nu hulic a kawaw King-ci-hiy-zen-sin-si-se i 2016 a mihcaan u Ke-lun-pi-ya mala tusa nu u kasatademaw a nizatengan nu kanatal. Columbia i tiniay a binacadan In-ti-an-zen , Si-pang-ya u micunutay a tademaw atu By-cuw nu kuli matenes ku ni kalalamel nueneng malaacawa pinaay tu lasubu a mihcaan hausa siwawa tu malalamelay tu ku izang nu In-o-hun-huy-zen-cun tademaw mala tu(58%)salengacay a tademaw pakala tu(20%)lumeni'ay salengacay malalemay a wawa (14%)lumeniay a tademaw(4%) atu In-ti-an u lumeni'ay a tademaw malalemelay a wawa(3%)ayzasatu uyza dada' pakala tu 1% ku tademaw u mapalucekay u tatenga'ay a tademawan, satu izaw tu nu uzapay a kamu atu lisin nu In-tian-zen , Ke-lun-pi-ya a ngangan a lisin u Tan-ku-ciw . (u kamu nu Hulam: .) Ke-lun-pi-ya nu La-ding-me-cuw a tademaw u sakatulu u tabakiay a kanatal, i Pa-si atu Mu-si-ke hawsa nu malukay a tademaw katuud sa pasayza i tuseay a tademaw palalecat pakay 1951 a mihcaan 57% ku talakaw katukuh 1994 a mihcaan tu 74%. 30 tuse nu tatemaw, malakunit tu 100,000 nuwalian siwa ku i sasaan a kenis micalat tu Ke-lun-pi-ya a hekal nu lala'tu 54%, nika caay pakala tu 3% a tademaw, tademaw u kakatuud nu tademaw i sasacacay kakatuud cacay a tademawan tu ping-ban-cian-mi. (u kamu nu Hulam: .) kawaw nu hitay Columbia nu La-ting-me-cuw u satabakiay a kanatal nu kawawa nu hitay izaw ku i tiniay u satabakiay u saicelangay a kawaw nu hity ayza u malahitaay a hitay izaw ku 445,000 ku tademaw, i tuni i kitakit u sakasabaw cacay, u pilawpes tu kalisiw nu hitay 121.45 i'nu amilika a kalisiw, i La-me kanatalan uyza dada' i Bazil . Columbia a cin-ci ha tinikatenes masaadidi' nu kanatal zen-bu anizatengan mawada tu atu siykay zen-bu a kasilut caay kanetek mahini ku nikalilit ayza satu Ke-lun-pi-ya zen-bu micuzuh tu Iyang-law-cing pasumat sapahapay tu babalaki a kalisiw, atu masazumaay mawada tu ku inaay a sakakawawan a hulic, zayhan i ayawway ningangayawan tu mahicahicaay a kawawa. Columbia tusa kuni u patahekalan a nilaculan u simal atu kuhi i ayaw caay ka kaph, kuhi u ni alaan kayadah atu aca caay ka kapah, simal paydemiad mawada' tu kuni patakal, maydih a lalit asa miazih mipatadas tu baluhay a ubah nu sumal. Columbia mahamin a mihcaan papulung tu cacay u kalinulakan a kawaw nu lisin, mahiniay u patinaku tu mahiniay u nu "tedemaway caay kunutuuday a lalangawanay u ni subelitan a caysan a nilaculan, tayhiw amipangangan ni sulitan tu Pa-lan-ci-ya-ciy-nian-hua"巴蘭基亞嘉年華". (u kamu nu Hulam: .) malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan CIA 外交部

Colombia Colombia Colombia kapolongan a kanatal (西班牙語:República de Colombia), pangangan han to Colombia , o Nan-me-cow i satipan no amisanay a kanatal. (o kamo no Holam: :República de Colombia), ) o Colombia sa ilabo no Congnanmeico, itiza i 4 00 N, 72 00 W, o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 1,138,910 km2, o ahebal no lala'ay sa 1,038,700 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa 100,210 km2 ,hamin no tademaw sa 47,220,856. kakalokan omah sa 37.50%, kilakilangan omah sa 54.40%, zomaay henay omah sa 8.10% tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Bogota . sapadateng no kanatal demiad sapadateng no kanatal demiad sa 20 bolad 7 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Iván Doqoe Márqoez , micakat a demiad sa i 2018 a mihca 8 bolad 7 demiad. o hata no Colombia o kolit no hata no Colombia sa ,sitolo a kolit, o takoliway o semilaway ato somanahay. Colombia Ke-lom-bi-ya-kong-he-ko (西班牙語:República de Colombia), pangangan han to Colombia , o Nan-me-cow i satipan no amisanay a kanatal. (o kamo no Holam: :República de Colombia), .) laylay i kasomamadan henay o Ci-po-ca a binacadan o Yin-ti-an a tademaw i tini moenengay tina lala'an Spain mihephepay pakalato 1500 a mihcaanay, katokoh to koynian a kakitizaan maka awas to mangangayawan, o hitay, onikawlah no ngangayaw ato libong no imelang, masolop amin ko baloco' no i tiniay Ci-po-zen a tademaw, o heni kalamkam sato a patizeng a i tiza noeneng sato i 1717 a mihcaan malahato mala o paso o Spain i Nan-me-cow no satipan nowamisan a kakitizaan no micomoday a lala'an kakitizaan "a Sin-ke-la-na-ta"新格拉納達". Colombia mikawaw to misateked i 1810 a mihcaan a mabowah pito a bolad sabaw tosa a demiad mosakamo amiliyas to Si-pang-ya a misateked , sazikozay i 1819 a mihcaan maala pakademec to, 1821 a mihcaan ato ayzaay a E-koa-do , Wey-ne-zoy-la , Pa-na-ma o nikasakapot to tabakiay a Colombia kapolongan a kanatal , ayza sato Sin-ke-lan-na-ta pasomad to ngangan no tabakiay a Colombia kapolongan a kanatal"大哥倫比亞共和國"(Gran Colombia)han Si-meng-po-li-wa-li-wa-el tahekal mala zong-tong , katokoh i 1830 a mihcaan onian a mihcaan Si-meng-po-li-wa-li-wa-el micozoh to onian a kanatal to nizatengan no tademawan min, lalabo no kanatal o cen-ce a to lala' malaengeli' sazikozay sato i a 1830 a mihcaanWiy-ne-zoy-la ato E-kowa-do miliyas to tabakiay a Colombia kapolongan a kanatal a misateket, Ta-ke-lon-pi-ya-kong-he-ko namahini sato malaliyas, Po-li-wa-li-wa-el i kalaloman patay sato, tabakiay a Colombia kapolongan a kanatal o liwan a lala' pasomat han ko ngangan Sin-ke-la-na-ta"新格拉納達"(Noeva Granada), 1856 a mihcaan pasomad to ngangan Ke-lan-na-da-lian-bang"格蘭納達聯邦"(Confederación Granadina)han, 1863 a mihcaan pasomad aca to ngangan Colombia-he-cong-ko"哥倫比亞合眾國" han, sazikozay(Estados Unidos de Colombia), Sazikozay i 1886 a mihcaan pasomad aca to ngangan no Colombia kapolongan a kanatal"哥倫比亞共和國"han, nika lalabo no kanatal caay kalecat koni o cen-ce o icelang pikowan makelap no zomaan no sangaan to malaliyasay mahiza to malalit sato hina mabowah to lalaboay kinangangaaw , hina bowah mangangayaw ko lalaboay no kanatal, 1903 a mihcaan Pa-na-ma I tini a Me-ko to pipadang mamakay Colombia a nisakateked . imahini Colombia mahiza to no padang henay a hitay mahiniay a hitay patinako o Colombia ke-min-ow-zoan-li-lian (FARC)), ato pacakayay to siledekay a sapayo' malawlaw to sato, o lalabo no kanatal a cen-ce kikasomad to masakangelo'an to ato pihazen to koni papelpel ko ni kaozip no binawlan amin, amalilit ko lalayan no Colombia a kanatal. namisateked hawsa katokoh i 2002 a mihcaan, omisatekeday a misakapotay ato o mazekeday a sakapot, Ze-yo-dang ato Paw-so-dang kakotay sa a mikawaw, Colombia a cong-dong ci U-li-wey namala cong-dong to 2002 a mihcaan, miala to pasaicelang atekatay a pakawananay a zazanan, FARC malawitan no oynian a kanatal a zen-bo, o kawaw namakay anito ni ongangayaw i 1983 a mihcaan namipatay to wama ni U-li-wiy , namacakat i pabaw U-li-wiy hasa, amipelpel to Colombia mingayaw ko saayaway a kawaw sato. An-di-de-san a boyo'an pabesot I nosatipa, malaliting ko boyo' ato dihep, I lilies no bayo' mapetpetay a nenal,satipan no anisanayno Ma-ke-da-lay-ma-he I sasa malikit masaopo I masanenalay, sawalian o Ya-ma-son-he ato Ao-li-no-ke-he ipabaw no kasacilis no saowac malikit tayza i masanenalay, macalap mahamin ko kanatal o he bala 2/3 ko hekal no lala'.o demiad no maozipay nolangaway Ke-lon-pi-ya tongosay o maozipay nolangaway o aadopan no hekal no lala' o kakakilac a kakitizaan, o akodiay a kakitizaan. (o kamo no Holam: .) Sakakawawan a keni no kakitizaan行政區劃 Colombia a kanatal mala o 3/2 a niyazo' ato cacay kahenolan a tose. (o kamo no Holam: ) zen-ze Ke-lon-pi-ya a zen-ze o cong-tong ko sitongosay to no Min-co-ze-cong-he-ko i panotek i lalabo a mikawaw, i tini i lalabo a sakakawawan Colombia-cong-tong o satalakaway no kanatal o sibonoay aca a zen-ze mikawaw a tokatootay a sakapotan, Sin-zen-coan si tongosy mikawaw o zen-bo ko mikawaway, Colombia cenho ato Ko-hoy tosaay a tatengilan a kanatal, Can-iy-oyan atoKong-iy-oen sitongosay to holic Li-ba-coan , Se-ba-ki-go misateked mikawaw to no holic a kawaw King-ci-hiy-zen-sin-si-se i 2016 a mihcaan o Ke-lon-pi-ya mala tosa no o kasatademaw a nizatengan no kanatal. Colombia i tiniay a binacadan In-ti-an-zen , Si-pang-ya o miconotay a tademaw ato By-cow no koli matenes ko ni kalalamel noeneng malaacawa pinaay to lasobo a mihcaan haosa siwawa to malalamelay to ko izang no In-o-hon-hoy-zen-con tademaw mala to(58%)salengacay a tademaw pakala to(20%)lomeni'ay salengacay malalemay a wawa (14%)lomeniay a tademaw(4%) ato In-ti-an o lomeni'ay a tademaw malalemelay a wawa(3%)ayzasato oyza dada' pakala to 1% ko tademaw o mapalocekay o tatenga'ay a tademawan, sato izaw to no ozapay a kamo ato lisin no In-tian-zen , Ke-lon-pi-ya a ngangan a lisin o Tan-ko-ciw . (o kamo no Holam: .) Ke-lon-pi-ya no La-ding-me-cow a tademaw o sakatolo o tabakiay a kanatal, i Pa-si ato Mo-si-ke hawsa no malokay a tademaw katood sa pasayza i toseay a tademaw palalecat pakay 1951 a mihcaan 57% ko talakaw katokoh 1994 a mihcaan to 74%. 30 tose no tatemaw, malakonit to 100,000 nowalian siwa ko i sasaan a kenis micalat to Ke-lon-pi-ya a hekal no lala'to 54%, nika caay pakala to 3% a tademaw, tademaw o kakatood no tademaw i sasacacay kakatood cacay a tademawan to ping-ban-cian-mi. (o kamo no Holam: .) kawaw no hitay Colombia no La-ting-me-cow o satabakiay a kanatal no kawawa no hitay izaw ko i tiniay o satabakiay o saicelangay a kawaw no hity ayza o malahitaay a hitay izaw ko 445,000 ko tademaw, i toni i kitakit o sakasabaw cacay, o pilawpes to kalisiw no hitay 121.45 i'no amilika a kalisiw, i La-me kanatalan oyza dada' i Bazil . Colombia a cin-ci ha tinikatenes masaadidi' no kanatal zen-bo anizatengan mawada to ato siykay zen-bo a kasilot caay kanetek mahini ko nikalilit ayza sato Ke-lon-pi-ya zen-bo micozoh to Iyang-law-cing pasomat sapahapay to babalaki a kalisiw, ato masazomaay mawada to ko inaay a sakakawawan a holic, zayhan i ayawway ningangayawan to mahicahicaay a kawawa. Colombia tosa koni o patahekalan a nilacolan o simal ato kohi i ayaw caay ka kaph, kohi o ni alaan kayadah ato aca caay ka kapah, simal paydemiad mawada' to koni patakal, maydih a lalit asa miazih mipatadas to balohay a obah no somal. Colombia mahamin a mihcaan papolong to cacay o kalinolakan a kawaw no lisin, mahiniay o patinako to mahiniay o no "tedemaway caay konotooday a lalangawanay o ni sobelitan a caysan a nilacolan, tayhiw amipangangan ni solitan to Pa-lan-ci-ya-ciy-nian-hoa"巴蘭基亞嘉年華". (o kamo no Holam: .) malalitin to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinengan CIA 外交部
